Class Dragon

java.lang.Object
Dragon
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlueDragon, GreenDragon, PinkDragon, PurpleDragon
public abstract class Dragon extends Object
Abstract Dragon class represents each Players character on the GameBoard. There are two to four of these in each game. Created by:
Author:
Navya Balraj

  • Constructor Details

    • Dragon

      public Dragon​(GameBoard gameBoard, int initialX, int initialY, String name, String imagePath, int xPos, int yPos)
      Constructor for Dragon class.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - the Gameboard the Dragon is on
      initialX - the x value of the Location of the Dragon
      initialY - the y value of the Location of the Dragon
      name - of the Dragon
      imagePath - link where the image of the Dragon is
      xPos - the x position of the Dragon on the GameBoard
      yPos - the y position of the Dragon on the GameBoard
